document_data.name: ''Moccasins of Free Movement''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Moccasins of free movement''''' were footwear enchanted with the [[pluma]] [[spell]] ''[[create talisman]]''.
document_data.Powers: These magical shoes functioned just like ''[[boots of elvenkind]]'' with regards to allowing the wearer to move about silently. Additionally, they provided the wondrous ability to traverse any surface with ease provided the wearer was walking. This included snow, mud, sticky tar, and even water.
